body.name: Deluxe 8 Inch Stainless Steel Skillet Pan Nonstick, Gas, Electric, Induction, Dishwasher Safe
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 52 mins
features: [How to Achieve Non-stick?] To achieve the ideal non-stick effect with stainless steel pans, begin by preheating the pan over medium heat for 2-3 minutes. Drop water into the pan to check the temperature. If the water droplets evaporate quickly due to high temperature, it means the pan is not hot enough. If the water droplets swirl on the surface of the pan, adjust to low heat, and spray cooking oil. Then, put the food in the pan for cooking to achieve a non-stick effect

[Stay-Cool Handle & Easy To Storage] The dimater of the pan is 8 inch, the joints of stainless steel pan and handle is reinforced by rivet technology which is firm and hard to fall off, so you can easily pour food; and when you grab onto the handle you will feel the handle still stay cool and not get burned when cooking thanks to design of hollow handle. There is a loop hole in the end of the steel pan handle for hanging to save the storage space

[Healthy & Non-Toxic Pan] There are various of pots and pans such as non stick pan, coated skillet, ceramic frying pan etc, but you will worry whether the coating cause the healthy problem when coating begin to scratch and peel. However, Stainless steel frying pan without coating which is free of PFOA, PFOS, lead & cadmium for a healthy and safe experience day in and out. In addition, This FRY pan is a delight for cooking a quick egg in, or a grilled cheese sandwich.

[Work On All Stoves & Oven Safe] DELUXE fry pan is very convenient to scrambled caramelizing onions, fry steak, and homemade tortillas etc. on all kinds of stoves such as electric, gas, ceramic, halogen and induction. It is also oven up to 500℉ to make some dessert and pies of meat, friut, vegetable

[How to Clean Stubborn Stains?] The 8" skillet is easy to clean, it is dishwasher safe.If your stainless steel pot has stubborn stains, try these tips: Squeeze the juice of half a lemon into the dirty pot and add the lemon peel. Pour in some baking soda and white vinegar, then boil over medium-low heat, stirring for about 2-3 minutes. Afterward, wipe the pot with a clean cloth and rinse with water. It's recommended to wipe the pot with a dry rag before storing it

[304 Stainless Steel Pan] The frying pan is made of 18-10 premium stainless steel, the tri-ply impact-bonded base by casted with double stainless steel layers and one aluminum core layer to make the steel pan heat more distribute evenly and quickly when cooking. And due to the stable structure of stainless steel which features corrosion-resistant and oxidation-resistant, it can be contact with food safely which will not reaction with food
body.description: Must-cookware for every kitchen All-purpose skillet Constructed from a durable 18-10 stainless steel and aluminum, this skillet is a must-have tool for every kitchen. It can be used in temperatures of up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit. You will especially appreciate how the stainless steel pan is able to distribute heat evenly for a perfectly cooked meal making it the go-to choice for sauces, stir-fry, chicken and a host of other everyday dishes. Tips Avoid leaving an empty pan on a hot burner or in a hot oven.Do not put a hot pan into cold water. Wash it in soapy water and sponge after the pan cool down.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stainless steel frying pan can satisfy diverse needs of culinary enthusiasts is an ideal selection for heathy cooking in kitchen DELUXE stainless steel skillet is designed with a modern appearance and long-lasting durability. It constructed from a durable, single-layer metal construction with tri-ply impact-bonded base. The inner layer of the stainless steel pans set is made by food-grade 18-10 stainless steel with corrosion-resisted and oxidation-resisted, which can directly and safely contact the food. The inter layer is made of pure aluminum, and the outer layer is made of 430 magnetic stainless steel which can conduct heat evenly and quickly. Therefore, it can easily satisfy the diverse needs of culinary enthusiasts by frying, stewing, boiling, simmering, and baking.

The small fry pan is made of the 18-10 stainless steel, which feature s durable and it is scratch-resistant and won’t scuff or wear down from the use of metal utensils.Although it is safe in metal spatulas, We recommend to use spatulas such as wooden, silicone spatulas while cooking to protect the cooking pot and prolong its life. The skillet is very important to have a handle that not only stays cool to the touch, but is also ergonomic and comfortable to hold.The fry pan designs with hollow handle can keep the handles from getting hot. Moreover, the hole in the handle can save storage space by hanging on the wall. Oven-safe riveted stainless steel handles are also a must for a frying pan, so that the pan can go directly from the stovetop to the oven or broiler. And the handle is connected with the frying pan by rivet reinforcement, which is solid, hard to fall off

Must-cookware for every kitchen All-purpose skillet Constructed from a durable 18-10 stainless steel and aluminum, this skillet is a must-have tool for every kitchen. It can be used in temperatures of up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit. You will especially appreciate how the stainless steel pan is able to distribute heat evenly for a perfectly cooked meal making it the go-to choice for sauces, stir-fry, chicken and a host of other everyday dishes. Tips Avoid leaving an empty pan on a hot burner or in a hot oven.Do not put a hot pan into cold water. Wash it in soapy water and sponge after the pan cool down. Details 18-10 high quality stainless steel Ergonomic stainless steel handles Safe for metal utensils Induction ceramic hallgon gas electric compatible Easy to clean – dishwasher safe Oven safe to 500° F Free of PFOS & PFOA Distribute heat evenly and fast

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I have not tried the burger press yet but this pan and the larger one are very nice, well made, actually seem better made than an Alclad Pan I have. They clean up pretty easy. One just needs to get used to scrubbing more than one would a non-stick pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small meals
reviews.reviewText: I needed a replacement for a much-used 6" Faberware skillet I've had for almost thirty years. This Deluxe skillet is slightly bigger, with tapered sides; just what I was looking for, at a reasonable price. Unlike some reviewers, I haven't had issues with food sticking or difficult clean-up, then again, I've only used either stainless or glass (remember Visions by Corningware?). I mostly use for sautéing or a quick stir fry, with a silicone spoonula to prevent damage to the surface. A little cooking spray works well, as long as you let the meat release when its ready. Prior to washing, a quick scrub with a little vinegar and baking soda loosens any remnants that may stick. For me, this was a great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well Everything Sticks
reviews.reviewText: I would have given a perfect review but everything sticks, but it is easy to clean. Nice weight to it so it should have a decent durability but you can't really tell that when you first purchase something.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The burger press
reviews.reviewText: I’m a typical online shopper. I was surprised to see the burger press I was looking for a decent stainless steel skillet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: use it for eggs and omelets and works great just slightly oil and should be good to go

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excelente relación calidad precio
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Quedé muy satisfecho con el producto. Tengo casi toda mi batería de cocina en acero de diferentes tipos. Desde el de máxima calidad AISI316 hasta versiones más económicas, pero me hacía falta una sartén pequeña. Este acero AISI304 18/10 tiene muy poco o nada que envidiarle al "quirúrgico". El acabado es excelente, la construcción se siente robusta, la distribución de la temperatura apropiada. Mucho más económica que otras alternativas, de marcas reconocidas, pero que usan acero de menos calidad. La uso casi todos los días para todo tipo de preparaciones. Es muy IMPORTANTE tener en cuenta que para usar el acero inoxidable se requiere un manejo muy preciso de la temperatura para conseguir la antiadherencia. En el video estoy friendo un par de huevos con muy poco aceite de oliva. Esto hay que hacerlo con la técnica apropiada o sino se va a pegar. Con el uso, y dependiendo las preparaciones, pueden aparecer manchas. Sin embargo se lava con una esponjilla brilla olla suave "steel wool" y queda espectacular, como nueva. No se deben usar esponjas abrasivas de metal

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hoping to be heavier
reviews.reviewText: Excellent pan. I was hoping the bottom would be thicker. Hint: if you are one of those people with sticking problems, maybe try more a touch more heat before you drop the eggs, then immediately turned the heat down the way you like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cooks food properly
reviews.reviewText: Great! Just what I wanted. Good quality. Cleans well.
